Hero.description: A central hub for students connected to Central & Eastern Europe at Bocconi. Flagship events, career acceleration, and a network that spans the region.
Hero.pillar1Desc: Signature nights and panels that define the semester. High production value, high engagement.
Hero.pillar2Desc: Direct line to companies and alumni across the CEE region. Real opportunities.
Hero.pillar3Desc: A home away from home. Dinners, trips, and community that feels like family.

Highlights.title: Formats that work at Bocconi
Highlights.p1: The associations that feel inevitable on campus are the ones that ship. Repeatable formats. A visible identity. Clear ownership. Weâ€™re building that level of consistency around Central & Eastern Europe.
Highlights.p2: If something is worth doing, it should look like it was designed. That is the bar we hold for programming, partnerships, and comms.
Highlights.feature1Desc: Student-run, but structured: a cadence that compounds, roles that are real, and a system that makes people trust you.
Highlights.feature2Desc: A clean offer, a curated audience, and formats that scale from workshops to flagship nights. Sponsorship should be simple.
Highlights.format1Desc: One signature event per semester: speakers + culture, executed like a product launch.
Highlights.format2Desc: Workshops, interview prep, and company touchpoints for CEE-facing teams.
Highlights.format3Desc: Dinners, tandems, city walks. Belonging is built in rooms, not feeds.

JoinUsPage.title: Join Us
JoinUsPage.content: We are always looking for new members to join our team. Connect with us to learn more about recruitment.

AboutPage.title: What CEEA is.
AboutPage.mission: A student association at Bocconi is a structured, student-run organization that builds community and creates programming on campus: events, partnerships, and a visible presence in the student ecosystem. CEEA focuses that energy around Central & Eastern Europe.
AboutPage.pillarsTitle: Three things we refuse to be mediocre at
AboutPage.pillar1Body: A consistent cadence: flagship events, smaller formats, and collaborations with other Bocconi associations.
AboutPage.pillar2Body: Belonging for students connected to CEE, and a curious doorway for everyone else.
AboutPage.pillar3Body: Company touchpoints and alumni connections, especially where CEE context is an advantage.
AboutPage.reality1Body: Associations typically recruit at the start of semesters and during on-campus association fairs. Consistency and clear roles matter more than huge headcount.
AboutPage.reality2Body: The strongest associations operate like a small studio: defined owners, repeatable formats, and a high bar for comms, logistics, and partner experience.
AboutPage.reality3Body: Joint events with other associations are common and high-leverage: they extend reach, share best practices, and create more interesting formats.
AboutPage.reality4Body: In a campus full of posters, your visual system is part of your credibility. A consistent aesthetic signals seriousness, even for social events.
AboutPage.peopleBody: This page is intentionally simple for now. In the admin dashboard we can add a Team table next, and render committee members here with photos, roles, and LinkedIn links.
AboutPage.peopleNote: Suggested sections: President, Vice President, Events, Partnerships, Marketing, Finance, Operations, and Alumni Relations.
AboutPage.partnersBody: We collaborate with companies, alumni, and other Bocconi associations. If you want a curated audience and a clean execution, we should talk.
AboutPage.partner1Body: A focused session (60-90 min) with real value: case, hiring, or region-specific insights.
AboutPage.partner2Body: Brand placement + speaking moment + recruiting angle, aligned with a signature event.
AboutPage.partner3Body: Enable small formats: dinners, cultural calendar moments, and student travel experiences.
AboutPage.contactBody: For sponsorships, speakers, and collaborations: send a clear ask and a timeline. We reply faster when the brief is concrete.
AboutPage.contact1BodyPre: Include: format (workshop/speaker/flagship), date window, and audience.
AboutPage.contact2Body: Instagram/LinkedIn placeholders can go here once ready.
